New Records: Mohammad Rizwan broke the record for the highest run chase in a World Cup with 134 runs
Key Match Events: Pakistan successfully broke the record for the highest ever run chase in a World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's top three needed to return to form
Sri Lanka's bowlers needed to improve from their South Africa game
Theekshana was available for the match
Mickey Arthur emphasized Pakistan's need to be at their best against Asian rivals
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Rizwan was named Player of the Match
The win boosted Pakistan's morale ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wickets in India were less forgiving
Sri Lanka's inexperienced bowlers struggled in batting-friendly conditions
The match was Pakistan's highest run chase in a World Cup
